<noinclude>
This template creates a warning box for highlighting critical information.

== Usage ==
<pre>
{{Warning|Your warning text here}}
{{Warning|title=Short title|Detailed body text}}
</pre>

== Parameters ==
* '''1''' - The warning text (required unless title is given)
* '''title''' - Optional title text

[[Category:Templates]]
</noinclude><includeonly><div class="df-admonition df-warning">{{#if:{{{title|}}}|'''⚠️ Warning: {{{title}}}''' {{{1|}}}|'''⚠️ Warning:''' {{{1}}}}}</div></includeonly>
